resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102853</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102853</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086000</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Focus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fokus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Foyer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Foco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuoco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εστίαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Foco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Focus, the first Feature of Effective Writing, is the "so what?" in a piece of writing. This article will help you teach students to stay on topic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fokussieren Sie, das erste Merkmal des 
wirkungsvollen Schreibens, sind "so, was?" in einem Stück 
Schreiben. Dieser Artikel hilft Ihnen, Kursteilnehmer zu 
unterrichten, auf Thema zu bleiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Focalisez, le premier dispositif de l'écriture 
pertinente, êtes "ainsi ce qui?" dans un morceau d'écriture. 
Cet article vous aidera à enseigner des étudiants à rester 
sur le sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Focalize, a primeira característica da escrita 
eficaz, seja "assim que?" em uma parte de escrita. Este 
artigo ajudar-lhe-á ensinar estudantes permanecer no tópico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metta a fuoco, la prima caratteristica di 
scrittura efficace, è "così che cosa?" in una parte di 
scrittura. Questo articolo li aiuterà ad insegnare gli allievi 
rimanere sul soggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εστίαση, το πρώτο χαρακτηριστικό γνώρισμα του 
αποτελεσματικού γραψίματος, είναι "έτσι τι;" σε ένα 
κομμάτι του γραψίματος. Αυτό το άρθρο θα σας βοηθήσει να 
διδάξετε τους σπουδαστές για να μείνει στο θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enfoqúese, la primera característica de la 
escritura eficaz, es "tan qué?" en un pedazo de escritura. 
Este artículo le ayudará a enseñar a estudiantes a permanecer
en asunto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHLEEN CALI
FN:KATHLEEN CALI
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086000</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102853</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/focus</uri>
      </location>
